confusion.name: Confusion
confusion.description: The target is hit by a weak telekinetic force. This may also confuse the target.

psybeam.name: Psybeam
psybeam.description: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

psychic.name: Psychic
psychic.description: The target is hit by a strong telekinetic force. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.
effects: 10% chance to lower Special Defense by 1 stage

hypnosis.name: Hypnosis
hypnosis.description: The user employs hypnotic suggestion to make the target fall into a deep sleep.

meditate.name: Meditate
meditate.description: The user meditates to awaken the power deep within its body and raise its Attack stat.

agility.name: Agility
agility.description: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

teleport.name: Teleport
teleport.description: Use it to flee from any wild Pok√©mon.

kinesis.name: Kinesis
kinesis.description: The user distracts the target by bending a spoon. This lowers the target's accuracy.

psycho_shift.name: Psycho Shift
psycho_shift.description: Using its psychic power of suggestion, the user transfers its status conditions to the target.
effects: transfers user's status condition to target

barrier.name: Barrier
barrier.description: The user throws up a sturdy wall that sharply raises its Defense stat.

light_screen.name: Light Screen
light_screen.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from special attacks for five turns.
effects: reduces special damage by 50% for 5 turns

reflect.name: Reflect
reflect.description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.
effects: reduces physical damage by 50% for 5 turns

amnesia.name: Amnesia
amnesia.description: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.
effects: raises user's Special Defense by 2 stages

dream_eater.name: Dream Eater
dream_eater.description: The user eats the dreams of a sleeping target. It absorbs half the damage caused to heal its own HP.
effects: heals user for 50% of damage dealt

rest.name: Rest
rest.description: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.
